attributes.action: Re open the exemption for Xl bully dogs in England
attributes.additional_details: I feel this short period of time to pay and register Xl bullies has been unfair, people are living with cost of living crisis, Christmas, unforeseen personal issues, and winter fuel bills, just do the right thing and give struggling families a chance.
attributes.background: Give more time for people to pay the exemption fee, reopen the registration and give people a chance.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Delay the ban on rehoming and owning XL Bully dogs for 18 months
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650474
